column5: I'm just wondering if anyone will be fishing on Christmas Day besides me. Weather permitting that is.

Last time I pulled that off was when I got a brand new pair of Neoprene  Waders from my wife. She was thrilled .. I took my (then 5 year old daughter) down to Bronte and came back with a pretty 5lb silver coho ... isnt that why they extended the season to Dec 31st  Actually I think it was Boxing day ... the regs protect all fish on Christmas day
Blyght and I were thinking about it...and if the weather is right and the kids are entertained...who knows?? haha.
Well if somebody could stop by and pick me up on the way, I'd really appreciate it!

Glad to hear I'm not the olny one.  Well Greencoachdog, I would but I have no ride so I'll be going to the local hangout I guess for pike?   Or whatever else comes along. I might even do boxing day since I'm not one for crowds.
You guys are bold, or maybe I'm too timid...  I'll be too full anyway if my eating plans work out.    Mike
Ice or not I'll fish off the docks at my sisters for christmass, and watch NFL all day sunday.
I hope to be fishing if it stops raining and the tribs aren't too muddy...
I am going to try sunday for some rainbows and browns.No fishin xmas day but Christmas eve I 'll take it.The waiders are coming out of storage LOL.I am not going to sleep until sunday night.Mike
hahaha you've got to be kidding.  I'd have my butt kicked so far into 2007.  Wouldn't even contemplate it.

That's the great thing about my wife...she wants to head out to fish as much...if not more than I do....I'm a lucky guy!!!  Christmas Eve is looking like a good day though...Christmas day and Boxing Day it looks likes colder weather...with snow....
Fishing Christmas Day? You must be kidding.
Rizzo ..... if you see someone flying pass you on your way into 2007 ... that would probably be me.
Christmas Day would be taboo 'round here, but boxing day is always a possibility.
yup for sure! we are gonna have our dinner on christmas eve, sooo yeah ill be out at my fav trib! hey DSN where are u planing to get out?
Hmmm haven't decided yet.    I'll know  by tomorrow evening.
I'll be out fishing in the afternoon for sure. Hopefully I'll get the boat out.
He Rich do a vid.   Hvaen't seen one for along time.  dsn
ive done it many times in the past and have always done well and you for sure will not see anyone around to bug you its great
